Brett Fraley

Software Developer - Lexington, KY

Code::

Try divjot

Divjot is a simple and powerful live web editing tool that I made for myself. I continue to refine and add features in my spare time.

tapebox

Tapebox implements a concept for an abstract virtual machine, along with a simple set of instructions, and an interpreter runtime. Written in Python, it is currently a work in progress.

lexninja

lexninja is a text based (run in terminal) adventure game. I designed and wrote the game from scratch as my text-adventure assignment during week 2 of bootcamp at Awesome Inc. Can you complete the mission?
